title: Conservative Pastors Deliver Sharp Criticism Of Same-Sex Marriage
teaser: Conservative pastors are vowing to mobilize in opposition to the Supreme Court's legalization of same-sex marriage. Although the decision applies to government actions, not religious ceremonies, some of these pastors say they reject such a separation of church and state functions.
